descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: John Collins and Julius Randle exchange some words while the refs deal with a shot clock malfunction.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Collins, Randle exchange words during stoppage) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collins, Randle exchange words during stoppage

videos.description: Trae Young absorbs the contact and flips in the floater plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young flips in the and-1) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young flips in the and-1

videos.description: Trae Young drops the pass to Clint Capela who rocks the rim with a two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young threads needle to Capela for slam) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young threads needle to Capela for slam

videos.description: During a ref discussion, Julius Randle does not want to give the ball to Danilo Gallinari.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle does not want to give the ball to Gallinari) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle does not want to give the ball to Gallinari

videos.description: Julius Randle knocks down the 3-pointer right as the first-quarter buzzer expires.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle beats the first-quarter buzzer with a 3) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle beats the first-quarter buzzer with a 3

videos.description: Trae Young maneuvers himself into the lane and throws it up to John Collins for the two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young connects with Collins for alley-oop jam) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young connects with Collins for alley-oop jam

videos.description: Trae Young steps back to the Hawks' logo and splashes the 3.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young hits 3 from the logo) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young hits 3 from the logo

videos.description: Trae Young attacks Julius Randle off the dribble, then lobs it up to Clint Capela for the two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young breaks down Randle, lobs it to Capela for slam) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young breaks down Randle, lobs it to Capela for slam

videos.description: Julius Randle gets into the lane and gives the nice drop-off pass to Nerlens Noel for the easy dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle dishes it off to Noel for the slam) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle dishes it off to Noel for the slam

videos.description: Kevin Huerter steps way behind the line and nails the long 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Huerter channels Trae Young, hits 3 from the logo) 2021/04/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Huerter channels Trae Young, hits 3 from the logo

videos.description: Trae Young makes the floater and tells Immanuel Quickley he's too small.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young tells Quickley he's too small after hitting floater) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young tells Quickley he's too small after hitting floater

videos.description: Derrick Rose throws the lob from just beyond half court to Obi Toppin for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rose throws half-court lob to Toppin for the jam) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rose throws half-court lob to Toppin for the jam

videos.description: Clint Capela gets the dunk then swats Julius Randle's shot and breaks out the Dikembe Mutombo wave.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Capela breaks out the Mutombo wave to celebrate dunk and block) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Capela breaks out the Mutombo wave to celebrate dunk and block

videos.description: Trae Young speaks postgame about the Hawks' Game 3 win and how great it was to play in front of the Atlanta crowd.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Trae Young: Hawks rode wave from crowd to win) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young: Hawks rode wave from crowd to win
